channel.title: Help with Client
channel.description:
Alright, So here's the problem. I gave my friend the client, which I can access 100% fine on all IP's I've tried... But he can't. It either loads and says Error connecting to the server, or it doesn't even open at all. I have indeed portforwarded the Server and such.
Help please.

item.title: Help with Client
item.dc:creator: @ModChris ModChris
item.description:
@ModChris wrote:

Alright,
So here’s the problem. I gave my friend the client, which I can access 100% fine on all IP’s I’ve tried… But he can’t. It either loads and says Error connecting to the server, or it doesn’t even open at all. I have indeed portforwarded the Server and such.

Help please.

Read full topic
